reference.title: External Roles
reference.shortdesc: External Roles (users) who need to get targeted by Documentation, Requirements, etc.

entry.p: "Simple" end-user that uses the software via its frontend. This might be a scientist using the software to view the results. The only important aspect for such a user is the "simple" usage of the frontend. They don't have to care about the technical details

row.entry: The person responsible for the operations of our project within an adopting team. Needs to be able to troubleshoot quickly on-premise. Therefore requires an understanding of the technical side (on a high level), troubleshooting guides and points of contact within our project

Develops backend-integrations to integrate Telestion into a specific project. Requires a high-level understanding of the technical side of the project, a firm understanding (reference) of the extension points of the Backend, resources to get started without frustration and a point of contact to a Developer Advocate

Develops custom data visualizations for the Frontend. Requires a high-level understanding of the technical side of the project, a firm understanding (reference) of the extension points of the Frontend, resources to get started without frustration and a point of contact to a Developer Advocate
The person deciding whether a project should adopt the Telestion project for its purposes. Requires a high-level overview (or Whitepaper) of what we do and don't provide to take an educated decision
